--- title: tciaclient keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A TCIA (The Cancer Imaging Archive) download client for Python." ---

class TCIAClient[source]

TCIAClient(baseUrl='https://services.cancerimagingarchive.net/services/v4', resource='TCIA')

tc = TCIAClient()
tc.get_image(seriesInstanceUid ="1.3.6.1.4.1.14519.5.2.1.7695.4001.306204232344341694648035234440", downloadPath ="./", zipFileName ="images.zip")
